mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INPUT_TAB ( CODE, LOTNO, GEARNO, WORKDATE, FIRENO, STATUS, REMARK, MESLOT) VALUES (#{pumcode}, #{lotno}, #{loadcnt}, SYSDATE, #{devicecode}, '0', #{remark}, #{meslot})
INSERT INTO INPUT_TAB (CODE, LOTNO, GEARNO, WORKDATE, FIRENO, STATUS) VALUES ('9999', '', 0, SYSDATE, #{devicecode}, '0')
